pageProduct.name: Thompson's Organic Magnesium 120 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Organic Magnesium supports muscle function & healthy cardiovascular system function.

Thompson's Organic Magnesium is formulated with organic forms of Magnesium to support:
- Muscle function and healthy muscle contraction
- Healthy cardiovascular system function
- Magnesium levels in the body to be within normal range
- General health & wellbeing
Magnesium aids the synthesis of neurotransmitters and it supports a healthy neuromuscular system. It also helps convert glucose into energy and assist with carbohydrate metabolism.

Size: 120tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support muscle health and function
• Helps healthy cell production
• Helps maintain healthy bones
• Helps support energy production
• General health & wellbeing

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamins supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains
Colecalciferol 2.5mcg
equiv. Vitamin D3 1mg(100IU)
Fucus vesiculosus (Kelp) ext. 5mg
derived from dry whole plant 25mg
equiv. Iodine 5mcg
Magnesium amino acid chelate 806mg
equiv. Magnesium 161mg
Magnesium aspartate dihydrate 100mg
equiv. Magnesium 7.5mg
Magnesium orotate 100mg
equiv. Magnesium 6.4mg
Total elemental Magnesium 174.9mg
Pyridoxine hydrochloride 30mg
equiv. to Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) 24.7mg

Contains: Sulfites

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
